title: Wireshark Tutorial - Profiles and Password captures
description: In this Wireshark Tutorial, I demonstrate show you how to leverage Wireshark Profiles to sniff traffic and capture passwords and better utilize the Wireshark interface. Save time! Get my full Wireshark Course for $10 here on Udemy:  or GNS3 Academy:   Download the Wireshark pcagng file here and follow along:   Wireshark Course  Full Wireshark Course for $10 on Udemy:   or GNS3 Academy:   #wireshark #wiresharktutorial #wiresharksniffing
